value.stringValue: Review and make changes to the partners objectives
Review and make changes to the account managers objectives
Update the partners route to market; Location of Focus, Sector and Company Size
Select opportunities and relate them to their influential primary campaign
Update the partners ethernet and FTTP run rate

fields.name: Records_Dont_Exist_Text
fields.fieldText:
Opportunity / Campaigns do not exist on {!Get_Account_Development_Plan.Name}


Please create a new campaign on the ADP or a new opportunity.

fields.name: Campaign_Selection_Text

fields.name: Opportunity_Selection_Text
fields.fieldText: Select an opportunity from the table that you would like to link with a campaign

fields.name: Forecast_Month_Selection_Text
fields.fieldText: Select the forecast months in the table below that you would like to update
